item.title: Flow Traders is a CRO Market Maker and Financial Services Provider
item.description: On August 26th, as per on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), Flow Traders, which is a market maker for CRO and a financial service provider, has withdrawn a cumulative total of 607 million CRO (valued at $60.47 million) from Crypto.com over the past 4 months. At present, 98.8% of the tokens have been transferred to contract addresses related to BitGo.

item.title: Kanye West's Personal Instagram Account Hacked to Promote Fake Token Project
item.description: On August 26th, Kanye West made a post on social media indicating that his personal Instagram account had been hacked and was used to follow a fake token project. The official project account for YZY is @YZY_MNY.

item.title: YZi Labs Announces Strategic Investment in USD.AI
item.description: On August 26th, as per official channels, YZi Labs declared that it has made a strategic investment in USD.AI, with the specific sum remaining undisclosed. USD.AI is a protocol that offers hardware-supported financing for artificial intelligence infrastructure.This investment is intended to expedite USD.AI's mission of constructing a new type of stablecoin, enabling it to expand in line with the growth of global computing requirements and enabling every operator to transform into a super computing power provider.USD.AI has formulated a distinctive financial solution aimed at addressing this capital acquisition issue. Contrary to traditional financing that relies on cash flow projections, USD.AI's loans are asset-backed, with each loan being backed 1:1 by actual AI hardware. This innovative approach enables loans to be completed within 7 days, which is a substantial acceleration compared to the 60-90 day procedure of traditional credit funds. This disparity in speed, which is crucia

item.title: ZachXBT: Crypto.com experienced a major incident that has not been disclosed to the public. At this time, details cannot be revealed.
item.description: August 26th. On-chain detective ZachXBT shared on social media that Crypto.com had once gone through a significant event in the past. However, they chose to conceal it and did not make it public. I am not permitted to disclose the specific details at this moment.

item.title: The Trump Media & Technology Group will integrate the Crypto.com Wallet and introduce the CRO token
item.description: On August 26th, as per market information, the Trump Media & Technology Group is set to integrate the Crypto.com digital wallet. Additionally, it will incorporate the CRO token into both the Truth Social and Truth+ platforms.

item.title: CRO Short-Term Breaks Through $0.2, Surging Over 19% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 26th, based on market data, CRO briefly exceeded $0.2 and is now trading at $0.192, with a 24-hour increase of 19.08%.

item.title: The Trump Media Group plans to spend $6.42 billion to acquire CRO Digital
item.description: On August 26th, as reported by Bloomberg, the Trump Media Group intends to acquire CRO Digital at a price of $6.42 billion.

item.title: Binance Wallet's Inaugural Mitosis Booster Attracts Over 90,000 Participants, Surpasses $300 Million in 7-Day Lock-up
item.description: August 26th, based on official information, Binance Wallet announced that the first stage of the Mitosis exclusive Booster event was successfully completed within 7 days. The total locked value exceeded $300 million, attracting more than 90,000 users to actively participate.Starting from today, the second stage of the Mitosis Booster event has officially begun. Users can deposit USDT or BNB into the Simple Yield Mitosis pool and have the chance to share a total of 1.4 million MITO rewards.

item.title: White House National Economic Council Director: Fed's September Meeting Likely to See 25 Basis Point Rate Cut
item.description: On August 26th, the White House Economic Adviser Bernstein stated that there is a high likelihood that the Fed will reduce interest rates by 25 basis points at the September meeting, and the risk of the Fed Chairman being overruled is "emerging" (IG).

item.title: White House Economic Council Director: Trump Dismissing Powell Could Lead to Inflation and Long-Term Rate Hikes
item.description: On August 26th, Brian Deese, the Director of the White House National Economic Council, when referring to Trump's removal of Federal Reserve Board member Lael Brainard, stated that this was an unprecedented assault on the Federal Reserve. Such an action could potentially result in inflation and an increase in long-term interest rates. (FX168)
